cast.name: 斯洛博丹·佩罗维奇 Slobodan Perovic
伊丽莎维塔·萨布利奇 Jelisaveta Sablic

writer.name: 戈尔丹·米希奇 Gordan Mihic

director.name: 戈尔丹·米希奇 Gordan Mihic

introduction: An aged boxer Đuka, left without any source of income, accompanied by a troupe of declining artists (ballet dancers),is roaming the suburbia streets, deceiving, cheating and occasionally murdering people. They hardly make ends meet, and the idea is underlined by grotesque acting performances that occasionally affect birds from the title. In spite of ensuing social problems, wretched suburbs from the movie symbolically represent the outskirts of human mind, where the moral values don't exist anymore.Despite the emphasized pesimism, ''Crows'' were very well accepted by domestic and foreign critics, and was screened at 11 world movie festivals, even at the accompanying program of the Cannes. But after domestic festival in Pula (Croatia), they were never screened again in its country of origin.
